data.text:
@SMBigBlueBus Better idea. Ban biden and newsom from the bus and let people get back to LIVIN' IN AMERICA! Let's Go Brandon!
https://t.co/vC12ndutro

@SMBigBlueBus @santamonicacity I used to ride the bus but have not since this stupid cashless fare. You have lost customers. 
 Really really bad buisness sense.

@yesmam47 @santamonicacity Hello! Thanks for your inquiry. We are continuing to evaluate the contactless fare pilot program to better understand the impact on customers. We greatly appreciate you sharing your feedback and thoughts on this topic. Thank you!
@kcorvo2 Hi @kcorvo2, as a transportation agency BBB has to follow the Transportation Security Administration's regulations. For more info check out: https://t.co/84gqoj1dhL

@SMBigBlueBus @santamonicacity When are you bringing back cash fares? 
With gas prices so high many who don't normally take the bus might want to now.
